entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of thunderstorms. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 1:30 PM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low plus 1 with risk of frost.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 1:30 PM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016
